name: Saratoga
skill: Deals 3540/4340 DMG to the enemy with the most HP.
ability: Sharply increases DMG dealt when another Black Ship is on the team.

additional_data.description: The spirit of one of the four black ships led by Commodore Perry when he reopened Japan. She and Perry had already known each other for quite some time and worked together on a number of other voyages.She's yet another casualty of his passion for Japanese anime, manga and video games. At first she was surprised when he asked her to cosplay with him, but she gradually got used to it and now even enjoys it. Some say she has been spotted cosplaying at major anime events.
additional_data.how_to_acquire:
◦Limited Jewel Summon 19/10/16 to 09/11/16
◦ Trade at Exchange for 50 Mochi 06/11/16 - 09/11/16
additional_data.notes_and_trivia:
◦ Increases damage dealt by team leader by 50% during the "Meiji Monster on a Rampage" event.
◦ Summon rate increased until 19/10/16 to 09/11/16
◦ Saratoga was one of the Black Ships used by Commodore Perry on his expeditions.

main: "It's okay. It's just how the Commodore is."
summon: "It's my responsibility to make sure the boss doesn't get out of control."
limit_break: "I'm just as good as any modern day ship!"
